p.shortTitle: The Railways (Employment Of Members Of Thearmed Forces) Act, 1965

longTitle.p: An Act to make certain provisions relating to the employment of members of the Armed Forces of the Union in the working and management of railways.

formula.name: EnactingText
formula.p: BE it enacted by Parliament in the Sixteenth Year of the Republic of India as follows:-

content.p: This Act may be called the
Railways (Employment of Members of the Armed Forces) Act, 1965.
It extends to the whole of India.

section.heading: Interpretation. Words and expressions used in this Act and defined in the Indian Railways Act, 1890 (9 of 1890), shall have the meanings respectively assigned to them in that Act.
Employment of members of Armed Forces of the Union to assist a railway administration in connection with the service of a railway.

blockList.listIntroduction: When any member of the Armed Forces of the Union is employed to assist a railway administration in connection with the service of a railway, then, whether such employment was before or is after the commencement of this Act,-

section.heading: Employment of members of Armed Forces of the Union to replace railway administration in working a railway. If at any time the whole of the working, management and maintenance of a railway or of a specific, portion or section of a railway, is assumed by the Armed

content.p: Forces of the Union, the Central Government may notify the fact of such assumption in the Official Gazette and thereupon, so long as such assumption continues, the Indian Railways Act, 1890 (9 of
), shall cease to be applicable to the Railway or the portion or section of the Railway concerned.
The Railways (Employment of Members of the Armed Forces) Ordinance, 1965 (4 of 1965) is hereby repealed.
